department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Required Works: Paving and asphalt repairs. Type of work: Paving. Project Timeline: Four weeks after award of the contract.
description: In general, the work under this contract will consist of, but will not necessarily be limited to partial removal of existing asphalt by milling the top 37.5mm, and the supply and installation of additional asphalt paving (mill/fill).
full_summary:
### Invitation to Qualify
#### Project Details
* **Project Title:** NAFC Paving Phase 2 – St. John’s, NL
* **Contracting Agency:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Agency:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Region of Delivery:** Newfoundland and Labrador
* **Contact for Clarifications:** Alexandria Dwyer, email: alexandria.dwyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Project Requirements
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a qualified contractor to provide paving and asphalt repair services at the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Centre (NAFC) in St. John’s, NL. The scope of work includes:

* Furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment, and materials for paving and asphalt repairs
* Milling the top 37.5mm of existing asphalt
* Supplying and installing additional asphalt paving (mill/fill)

#### Tender Details
* **Tender Reference Number:** WS3686672501-Doc3732923840
* **Tender Closing Date:** 17 November, 2022 at 1400 EST
* **Bid Security:** Required
* **Estimated Cost:** Between $100,001 and $500,000
* **Delivery Date:** Four weeks after award of contract

#### Notice and Inquiry
Please be advised of the amendment to closing time in the Canada Buys response deadline. All bid submissions must be made on 17 November, 2022 at 1400 EST. Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) reserves the right to declare any bid submitted after the closing time as non-responsive.

All inquiries of a technical nature and all questions of a contractual nature should be submitted to the Contracting Authority at alexandria.dwyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. Note that bid security is a requirement for this tender. All bidders are expected to provide this security in accordance with the terms and conditions of the contract.
